name: Reserve Pilot
Lore: 'Injuries kept Lord Vader''s best TIE wingman out of the primary wave of starfighters. He remains on reserve duty, ready to replace lost pilots.',
Text: 'Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Black 2, Black 3 or Black 4, also adds 1 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.',
